back.name: Study
back.flavour: You've been investigating the strange events occurring in Arkham for several days now. Your deck in covered in newspaper articles, police reports, and witness accounts.

front.name: Study
front.flavour: The door to your study has vanished.

back.name: Hallway
back.flavour: A moment of panic and disorientation strikes as you land upon the floor of the hallway. The world spins, as if turned on its head.

front.name: Hallway
front.flavour: The walls of your house are splattered with mud, and your hardwood floor is gone, replaced with a dirt path.

back.name: Attic
back.flavour: The smell of rotten meat assaults your nostrils as you approach the attic stairs.

front.name: Attic
actions: Forced - After you enter the Attic: Take 1 horror.
front.flavour: The bloody carcass of a malformed beast swings from a meat hook chained to the ceiling. Blood drains slowly from the carcass, dripping into a small barrel.

back.name: Cellar
back.flavour: The stairs leading down to your cellar are slick, and they glisten with a thin layer of ice...

front.name: Cellar
actions: Forced - After you enter the Cellar: Take 1 damage.
front.flavour: Your cellar seems to have been replaced with an underground network of icy tunnels and caverns. The cold chills you to the bone.

back.name: Parlor
actions: The entrance to the Parlor is blocked by a darkly glowing unfathomable barrier. You cannot move into the Parlor.
back.flavour: You're unsure what would happen if you tried to cross the threshold of the strange barrier, but based on its extreme heat, you sure as hell don't want to try.

front.name: Cellar
actions: <action>: Resign. "This is too much for me!" You run out the front door, fleeing in panic.
While Lita Chantler is not controlled by a player, she gains: "<action>: Parley. Test  (4). If you succeed, take control of Lita Chantler."
